abstract: United Nations Sec Gen Ban Ki-moon warns of possible election-related violence in Democratic Republic of Congo and urges Security Council and leaders in region to help preserve political stability in area.

headline.print_headline: Africa; Congo: U.N. Warns of Election Violence
headline.main: Congo: U.N. Warns of Election Violence

snippet: Secretary General Ban Ki-moon urged the Security Council to help United Nations peacekeepers preserve political stability in Congo.
lead_paragraph: Secretary General Ban Ki-moon urged the Security Council to help United Nations peacekeepers preserve political stability in Congo.
